root.name: Bounders and Cads
root.description: Bounders and Cads is a turn-based strategy game for up to 4 players released by Wax Lyrical Games in January 2013. Old Aunt Edna has died leaving a fortune to be claimed. The money will go to the player who can play the dirtiest tricks and earn the most money in business dealings. Buy up businesses, sabotage your opponents, deploy tricky strategies, and swindle your way to an inheritance. Players must avoid the main antagonist, the Brigadier.
